4301200.name: A Tangle of Snakes
4301200.description:
Help the snakes escape without getting hurt in this puzzle game! Scare them in the right direction to untangle them, but be careful—if a snake is startled too much, it will hurt itself or others. Different types of snakes add variety: some can break blocks, some change direction once, and others always go straight. Use strategy to guide them safely through the maze!

Key Features:

  • Beautiful minimalist graphics

  • Engaging and challenging gameplay

  • Cute and diverse snakes with unique abilities
4301200.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
